cause.description:
It is a non profit organization whose mission includes: <center>*Encouraging students to avoid drinking, gambling, smoking both on and off the property of the CEO facility and especially when out in any public areas.
<center>*Assist students to build relationships with United States students through correspondence and expose the students to higher technology education.
<center>*Help students in the district learn English and computer skills.
<center>*Practice self-discipline in school attendance and in study habits.
<center>*Teach youths to understand good advice, and to stay out of trouble.
<center>*Build new libraries for general public education.
<center>*Furnish teachers and students with school supplies, computers and textbooks used to study English and learn computer skills.
<center>*Provide meals before school, personal hygienes supplies, and basic medicine to students.
<center>*Offer humanitarian assistance to elderly, handicapped, widows, orphans, and malnourished infants.
<center>*Help people who face difficult situations who lack food or health screening.
<center>*Explain to parents the importance of improved hygiene in the family and advise them how to take care of their health.
More information at: http://www.cambodiaeducation.org/
1. Everyone is entitled to an education.
2. Learning the universal language (English) will increase a wider understanding of one another.
3. A healthier lifestyle starts with learning hygiene.
cause.mission: Help students in the district learn English and computer skills. Also to promote a healthier lifestyle.
